job_history.role_name: Sexual Assault Crisis Counselor / Victim Advocate
job_history.work_description: One on one trauma informed crisis counseling to clients with an emphasis on empowerment. Provide advocacy and accompaniment for clients at the hospital, police and court level. Provide support and counseling to family members and friends of victims. Community Outreach. Facilitates multiple support groups to men and women at various community agencies. Legislative Advocacy Committee Liaison. Attend multiple community meetings, roundtables, committees, teams.

Visited clients in their homes, nursing facilities and hospital setting. Maintained a caseload of 20 - 30 clients. Provided Psych-Social initial and updated assessments. Developed care plans for clients and their families. Coordinated community services for clients and their families.
Facilitated educational training in the community on domestic violence and sexual assault.
Train and Supervise 153 employees and new supervisors.
Developed and implemented curriculum on issues of domestic violence, sexual assault and self-esteem for male and female support groups.

skills.name: Counseling
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience providing one on one trauma informed crisis counseling, support groups, and counseling to family members and friends of victims, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Advocacy
skills.explanation: Provided advocacy and accompaniment for clients at the hospital, police, and court level, showing strong proficiency in advocacy.

skills.name: Community Outreach
skills.explanation: Participated in community outreach, facilitated educational training, and attended multiple community meetings, roundtables, committees, and teams, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised 153 employees and new supervisors, showing strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Trained and supervised employees, developed curriculum, and implemented educational training, suggesting strong proficiency in training and development.

skills.name: Social Work
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in social work, including maintaining a caseload, providing psych-social assessments, and coordinating community services, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Case Management
skills.explanation: Maintained a caseload of 20-30 clients, provided care plans, and coordinated community services, showing strong proficiency in case management.

skills.name: Group Facilitation
skills.explanation: Facilitated multiple support groups to men and women at various community agencies, suggesting strong proficiency in group facilitation.
